move Profiler API init

timeline.bodyText:
Just a nit - we should perhaps rename Profiler to something else. It is rather confusing now - initializing Profiler even if profiler is not enabled :)
MethodLeverTracer for the lack of more witty names?
timeline.author: jbachorik

timeline.message: Fix provider access before each sample
